data.question: What is the chemical formula for the metal-organic framework synthesized for the first time as mentioned in the text?
What are the key properties that TIFSIX-2-Ni-i exhibits according to the structural characterizations?
data.answer: A 2-fold interpenetrated network with narrow aperture of 5.1 Ã… (H-H distance) and abundant inorganic anion sites in the channel.

data.question: What makes TIFSIX-2-Ni-i particularly suitable for the separation of C2H2/C2H4 and C2H2/CO2 mixtures?
data.answer: Its high-performing separation properties, especially the effective C2H2 capture and highly selective separation of C2H2 over C2H4 or CO2.

data.question: How does the thermal stability of TIFSIX-2-Ni-i compare to TIFSIX-2-Cu-i and SIFSIX-2-Cu-i?
data.answer: TIFSIX-2-Ni-i is the most thermostable material among them, with a decomposition temperature higher than both TIFSIX-2-Cu-i and SIFSIX-2-Cu-i.

data.question: What role do the inorganic anion sites play in the functionality of TIFSIX-2-Ni-i?
data.answer: The inorganic anion sites increase the affinity to C2H2, resulting in exceptional acetylene capacity.

data.question: True or False: The introduction of six-coordinated Ni metal centers into TIFSIX-2-Ni-i decreases its thermal stability.
What is the significance of the pore size and chemistry control in TIFSIX-2-Ni-i for gas separation?
data.answer: The control of pore size and chemistry by changing anion pillar and metal node is crucial for the selective separation of gases, achieving efficient separations for C2H2/C2H4 and C2H2/CO2 mixtures.

data.question: True or False: TIFSIX-2-Ni-i has a lower C2H2 uptake capacity at 298 K and 1 bar compared to SIFSIX-2-Cu-i.
What experimental techniques were used to characterize the structure of TIFSIX-2-Ni-i?
data.answer: Powder X-ray diffraction (PXRD) and single-crystal X-ray diffraction.

data.question: True or False: TIFSIX-2-Ni-i exhibits a decrease in structural integrity when exposed to air with a humidity of 65% to 75% for several days.
